local_intent: Verify and, if needed, re-run precise side alignment to the T-block at yaw 90 before pushing.
assumptions: Yaw 90 deg is the desired pushing orientation
If the block is not visible, a raster scan is allowed before detection
Short wait provides settling before verification
coherence_with_global: Matches global flow: visibility check with scan fallback, DetectObject, SetTCPYaw(90), ApproachAndAlign(tolerance 0.01, timeout 1200) with retry for recovery, brief wait, then verify orientation. Does not execute push/retreat to keep focus on the verify phase around ApproachAndAlign.
